alias.Ewoks: None (although Leia called Wicket W. Warrick 'Jittery Little Thing')

Spirit Dream Eaters (good version)
Nightmare Dream Eaters (evil version)
alias.Scorchio: The Mighty Dragon from The World of Neopia

Simba's Pride (in the end of ''The Lion King'', ''The Lion King II: Simba's Pride'' and ''The Lion Guard'')

Stupid, Nice Boy, Nice Dinosaur (all by Dennis)
Spitter

origin.Kwamis: ''Miraculous Ladybug: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir''

homeworld.Rabbid: The Glade of Dreams, Earth, the Moon

Skilled in forest survival and the construction of primitive technology
Superb adapters and quick learners
Physically strong enough to overpower combat-trained humans despite their diminutive statures
Strength in numbers
Knowledge of pottery, hunting, and primitive flight, along with the creation of fire

Being metaphysical
Manifest elemental powers similar to that of their respective Elemental Masters
Flight
Can merge together and separate
abilities.Sphere's species: Can turn themselves into robots with a white dash across the middle
abilities.Annoying Villagers: Nose farting, teamwork, dancing skills, fighting and defense skills
abilities.Gluphosaurs: Shooting adhesive glue which can instantly hold any material together

Shapeshifting

abilities.Lemurians (Rifts): Floating Cities, Amphibious, Psionics, Magic, Bio-Tech

Long necks
Saw parts

hobby.Ewoks:
Hunting and gathering
Enjoying singing and playing music during celebrations, festivals, and rituals
Worshipping surrounding giant trees
hobby.Dream Eater (Spirit):
Assisting those trying to protect the Dream World (Spirit)
Bringing chaos all the around the Dream World (Nightmare)
hobby.Trolls (Frozen): Helping Anna, Elsa and / or Kristoff
hobby.Fleet Girls: Protecting humanity from being antagonized and attacked by the Abyssal Fleet
hobby.Mudokon:
Working
Getting away from Glukkon factories
Protecting wildlife on Mudos
Religious Beliefs
hobby.Annoying Villagers: Dancing, gaming, fooling around, wagings wars of conquest and player destruction, farting
hobby.Mon Calamari: Ruling with a fair and just hand, living their lives underwater, exploring the depths of space
hobby.Mii: Being played as by the player
hobby.Steambots:
Protect their mines
Minning
Various Jobs

goals.Minions: Serve the greatest villain. (but ends up doing something heroic)
goals.Guardians:
To protect the Dragon Realms from the evil Dark Master and his army of apes.
Raise and train chosen young dragons to become warriors.
goals.UrRu: To help Jen defeat the Skeksis and unify their species (successful)
goals.Ewoks: Assist Rebels to defeat The Galactic Empire.
goals.Dream Eater (Spirit):
Protect the Dream World (Spirit).
Cause chaos around the Dream World (Nightmare)
goals.Pikmin:
Help [[Olimar]] to fix his ship (''Pikmin'' and ''Hey! Pikmin'', succeeded)
Help Olimar and [[The President]] to retrive all treasures in PNF-404 and rescue [[Louie (Pikmin)|Louie]] (''Pikmin 2'', both succeeded)
Help the [[Koppaites]] to save their planet and rescue Olimar (''Pikmin 3'', both succeeded)
goals.Angry Birds:
To defeat the [[w:c:villains:Green Pigs|Bad Piggies]].
Save Magi from being invaded
goals.Scorchio: To live in peace on Neopia.
goals.Toa: Protect the universe from the evils
goals.Cats (Sleepwalkers):
Eliminate the Sleepwalkers by any means neccessary.
Serve Clovis.
Kill Mary Brady (succeeded).
goals.Elemental Creatures:
Guard the Masks of Unity from trespassers.
Defend Okoto.
goals.Snow Golem (Minecraft): Protect their creator from hostile mobs.
goals.Elemental Dragons: Assist Elemental Masters upon being summoned.
goals.Fleet Girls: Defend the seas from the Abyssal Fleet
goals.The Elite Force: To Saver The World From Evil
goals.Mudokon:
Save all of themselves from Glukkon factories.
Shut down the Magog Cartel.
Become the supreme race of Oddworld.
goals.Sphere's species: Destroy the [[w:c:villains:Harvesters|Harvesters]] and establish freedom across the universe.
goals.Gluphosaurs: Help Ty and his friends in any way possible <small>(succeeded)</small>.
goals.Mon Calamari: To help the Rebel Alliance destroy the Galactic Empire and restore peace and justice to the galaxy, to live peacefully within the Old/New Republic, to assist the Resistance
goals.Grand Spheres:
Defend Astrum.
Defeat the Dark Spheres.
goals.Lemurians (Rifts):
Protect innocent life.
Protect the environment.
Liberate Earth from evil invaders.
Defeat the Lord of the Deep.
goals.Dreadtrux: Help Ty and his gang defeat D-Structs and D-Stroy <small>(succeeded)</small>.
goals.Mii:
Assist or represent the player in their games (succeeded)
Get fit (''Wii Sports'' series; ongoing)
Defeat all villains on the Plaza Games (''StreetPass Mii Plaza''; succeeded)
Make new Mii friends (''StreetPass Mii Plaza'', ''Tomodachi'' series, and Miiverse; succeeded)
goals.Kwamis: To help the Miraculous Holders achieve good around the world
